properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee maargamu devaa bhoomi meeda kanabadu natlu nee rakshana anyulalo theliya badunu gaaka{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu mamu karuninchi deevinchunu Gaaka prakaashimpa jeyumu nee mukha kaantini maapai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Stutiyinchedaru gaaka maa devaa prajalu ninnu Stutiyinchedaru gaaka maa devaa prajalu ninnu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa neethitho neevu nyaayamu theerchedavu eledavu bhoomi Meeda nunna janulanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janulaananda yutsaaha dwani cheyuduru gaaka janulu devaa ninnu stutiyinchedaru gaaka{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhoomi phalinchunu Yehovaa mamu deevinchunu bhooloku landaru Daiva bhakhti kaligi yunduru{/lang-eng}
